priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Supporting Evidence for Re-Treatment Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C102579

self.title: CDISC SDTM Supporting Evidence for Re-Treatment Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the clinical evidence to support reason for re-treatment of disease.
name: Supporting Evidence for Re-Treatment
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Supporting Evidence for Re-Treatment Terminology

terms.definition: Objective evidence of bacterial infection perceptible to the examiner by laboratory procedure.
Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examiner (sign) and subjective evidence of disease perceived by the subject (symptom).
Objective evidence of disease perceptible to the examiner by radiological procedure.
